Hey HubSpot Dev Community,

:HubSpot: I help run HubSpot's Customer Success Solution Architecture team and my team is hiring for a *French language HubSpot Solution Architect.* 

The role is available in France, Germany or Ireland and can be located in-office or remote.

Success Solution Architects engage HubSpot's largest and most complex accounts to drive expanded usage and value of HubSpot's CRM platform. We help tie business goals to CRM usage and show 'the art of the possible'. We love to learn and value experimentation with all of HubSpot's newest tools (particularly the most technical parts of the platform) so we can help lead customers.

The successful candidate will have proven ability to consult on technical strategy to business leaders and have strong business acumen and executive presence (in addition to a strong technical background)

<https://www.HubSpot.com/careers/jobs/6308057?hubs_signup-cta=careers-apply|Learn more about the role> (this is the job posting for France) and let me know if you have any questions. Feel free to share with your networks too!
